articles.title: Thomas Kingston: Royals mourn Prince Michael of Kent's son-in-law - BBC.com
articles.description: The husband of Prince Michael of Kent's daughter has died at the age of 45, says a palace statement.
articles.content:
By Sean CoughlanRoyal correspondent
The King and Queen sent their "most heartfelt thoughts" to Mr Kingston's family

articles.title: Forget ‘Game Of Thrones’: FX’s ‘Shōgun’ Director Compares U.S.-Japanese Epic To A Different HBO Hit - Deadline

articles.content:
